caption.title: Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations of quarantines and camel slaughterhouses.
caption.p: Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations where quarantines are located (A). Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations where the camel slaughterhouses are located (B). Large blue circles represent the three slaughterhouses that kill the most camels.
